ygData.subject: Re: Guk Tricks [WAS:Re: Area Songs in Lguk [WAS:etc etc hehe
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Pulling the live side stuff to the dead side it kinda fun.  One night I was in a group in the Hand room and one of the wizards managed to get an eye of zom
ygData.messageBody:
>From: joseph <jmounts@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Guk Tricks [WAS:Re: Area Songs in Lguk [WAS:etc etc hehe
>Date: Thu, 10 Feb 2000 14:02:51 -0500
>
>I know what you mean about the crazy pulls...
>Was in the Savant room last night (got a BEM yay!), and our group saw all
>manner of things run past us. Minos, huge clusters of frogs, and even an
>EE! I'm not to well versed on the layout of Lower yet (getting there tho!)
>but i believe it was the Cavalier group who was pulling. People like to
>get a reputation as being a good puller by pulling crap from live side to
>dead side. Heck, once I was grouped with a Paly (can't remember his name)
>who was a damned good puller. He bragged that he once pulled something
>from upper guk! lol!
>
>Elwe Lay
>36 Songs
>Kinship of Valor
>Karana
>

Pulling the live side stuff to the dead side it kinda fun. One night I was
in a group in the Hand room and one of the wizards managed to get an eye of
zom to the live side. Well the aggro spread to just about everything on the
live side so when I would be out pulling I would auto-pull live side frogs
and minos from near the Frenzied room. It was pretty funny, some of the
battles got a bit out of control but it was great experience :)
